17/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/int32_sort.h */

26/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/int32_sort.c */
27/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
28
29
30static void minmax(crypto_int32 *x,crypto_int32 *y)
31{
32 crypto_uint32 xi = *x;
33 crypto_uint32 yi = *y;
34 crypto_uint32 xy = xi ^ yi;
35 crypto_uint32 c = yi - xi;
36 c ^= xy & (c ^ yi);
37 c >>= 31;
38 c = -c;
39 c &= xy;
40 *x = xi ^ c;
41 *y = yi ^ c;
42}
43
44static void int32_sort(crypto_int32 *x,int n)
45{
46 int top,p,q,i;
47
48 if (n < 2) return;
49 top = 1;
50 while (top < n - top) top += top;
51
52 for (p = top;p > 0;p >>= 1) {
53 for (i = 0;i < n - p;++i)
54 if (!(i & p))
55 minmax(x + i,x + i + p);
56 for (q = top;q > p;q >>= 1)
57 for (i = 0;i < n - q;++i)
58 if (!(i & p))
59 minmax(x + i + p,x + i + q);
60 }
61}
62

68typedef crypto_int8 small;
69

71

73
74

76

81/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/mod3.h */
82#ifndef mod3_h
83#define mod3_h
84
85
86/* -1 if x is nonzero, 0 otherwise */
87static inline int mod3_nonzero_mask(small x)
88{
89 return -x*x;
90}
91
92/* input between -100000 and 100000 */
93/* output between -1 and 1 */
94static inline small mod3_freeze(crypto_int32 a)
95{
96 a -= 3 * ((10923 * a) >> 15);
97 a -= 3 * ((89478485 * a + 134217728) >> 28);
98 return a;
99}
100
101static inline small mod3_minusproduct(small a,small b,small c)
102{
103 crypto_int32 A = a;
104 crypto_int32 B = b;
105 crypto_int32 C = c;
106 return mod3_freeze(A - B * C);
107}
108
109static inline small mod3_plusproduct(small a,small b,small c)
110{
111 crypto_int32 A = a;
112 crypto_int32 B = b;
113 crypto_int32 C = c;
114 return mod3_freeze(A + B * C);
115}
116
117static inline small mod3_product(small a,small b)
118{
119 return a * b;
120}
121
122static inline small mod3_sum(small a,small b)
123{
124 crypto_int32 A = a;
125 crypto_int32 B = b;
126 return mod3_freeze(A + B);
127}
128
129static inline small mod3_reciprocal(small a1)
130{
131 return a1;
132}
133
134static inline small mod3_quotient(small num,small den)
135{
136 return mod3_product(num,mod3_reciprocal(den));
137}
138
139#endif
140
141/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/modq.h */
142#ifndef modq_h
143#define modq_h
144
145
146typedef crypto_int16 modq;
147
148/* -1 if x is nonzero, 0 otherwise */
149static inline int modq_nonzero_mask(modq x)
150{
151 crypto_int32 r = (crypto_uint16) x;
152 r = -r;
153 r >>= 30;
154 return r;
155}
156
157/* input between -9000000 and 9000000 */
158/* output between -2295 and 2295 */
159static inline modq modq_freeze(crypto_int32 a)
160{
161 a -= 4591 * ((228 * a) >> 20);
162 a -= 4591 * ((58470 * a + 134217728) >> 28);
163 return a;
164}
165
166static inline modq modq_minusproduct(modq a,modq b,modq c)
167{
168 crypto_int32 A = a;
169 crypto_int32 B = b;
170 crypto_int32 C = c;
171 return modq_freeze(A - B * C);
172}
173
174static inline modq modq_plusproduct(modq a,modq b,modq c)
175{
176 crypto_int32 A = a;
177 crypto_int32 B = b;
178 crypto_int32 C = c;
179 return modq_freeze(A + B * C);
180}
181
182static inline modq modq_product(modq a,modq b)
183{
184 crypto_int32 A = a;
185 crypto_int32 B = b;
186 return modq_freeze(A * B);
187}
188
189static inline modq modq_square(modq a)
190{
191 crypto_int32 A = a;
192 return modq_freeze(A * A);
193}
194
195static inline modq modq_sum(modq a,modq b)
196{
197 crypto_int32 A = a;
198 crypto_int32 B = b;
199 return modq_freeze(A + B);
200}
201
202static inline modq modq_reciprocal(modq a1)
203{
204 modq a2 = modq_square(a1);
205 modq a3 = modq_product(a2,a1);
206 modq a4 = modq_square(a2);
207 modq a8 = modq_square(a4);
208 modq a16 = modq_square(a8);
209 modq a32 = modq_square(a16);
210 modq a35 = modq_product(a32,a3);
211 modq a70 = modq_square(a35);
212 modq a140 = modq_square(a70);
213 modq a143 = modq_product(a140,a3);
214 modq a286 = modq_square(a143);
215 modq a572 = modq_square(a286);
216 modq a1144 = modq_square(a572);
217 modq a1147 = modq_product(a1144,a3);
218 modq a2294 = modq_square(a1147);
219 modq a4588 = modq_square(a2294);
220 modq a4589 = modq_product(a4588,a1);
221 return a4589;
222}
223
224static inline modq modq_quotient(modq num,modq den)
225{
226 return modq_product(num,modq_reciprocal(den));
227}
228
229#endif
230

232#ifndef params_h
233#define params_h

235#define q 4591
236/* XXX: also built into modq in various ways */
237
238#define qshift 2295
239#define p 761
240#define w 286
241
242#define rq_encode_len 1218
243#define small_encode_len 191
244
245#endif

248#ifndef r3_h
249#define r3_h

252static void r3_mult(small *,const small *,const small *);
253
254extern int r3_recip(small *,const small *);
255
256#endif

259#ifndef rq_h
260#define rq_h

264
265static void rq_decode(modq *,const unsigned char *);
266
267static void rq_encoderounded(unsigned char *,const modq *);
268
269static void rq_decoderounded(modq *,const unsigned char *);
270
271static void rq_round3(modq *,const modq *);
272
273static void rq_mult(modq *,const modq *,const small *);
274
275int rq_recip3(modq *,const small *);
276
277#endif

287/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/dec.c */
288/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
289
290#ifdef KAT
291#endif
292
293
294int crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_dec(
295 unsigned char *k,
296 const unsigned char *cstr,
297 const unsigned char *sk
298)
299{
300 small f[p];
301 modq h[p];
302 small grecip[p];
303 modq c[p];
304 modq t[p];
305 small t3[p];
306 small r[p];
307 modq hr[p];
308 unsigned char rstr[small_encode_len];
309 unsigned char hash[64];
310 int i;
311 int result = 0;
312 int weight;
313
314 small_decode(f,sk);
315 small_decode(grecip,sk + small_encode_len);
316 rq_decode(h,sk + 2 * small_encode_len);
317
318 rq_decoderounded(c,cstr + 32);
319
320 rq_mult(t,c,f);
321 for (i = 0;i < p;++i) t3[i] = mod3_freeze(modq_freeze(3*t[i]));
322
323 r3_mult(r,t3,grecip);
324
325#ifdef KAT
326 {
327 int j;
328 printf("decrypt r:");
329 for (j = 0;j < p;++j)
330 if (r[j] == 1) printf(" +%d",j);
331 else if (r[j] == -1) printf(" -%d",j);
332 printf("\n");
333 }
334#endif
335
336 weight = 0;
337 for (i = 0;i < p;++i) weight += (1 & r[i]);
338 weight -= w;
339 result |= modq_nonzero_mask(weight); /* XXX: puts limit on p */
340
341 rq_mult(hr,h,r);
342 rq_round3(hr,hr);
343 for (i = 0;i < p;++i) result |= modq_nonzero_mask(hr[i] - c[i]);
344
345 small_encode(rstr,r);
346 crypto_hash_sha512(hash,rstr,sizeof rstr);
347 result |= crypto_verify_32(hash,cstr);
348
349 for (i = 0;i < 32;++i) k[i] = (hash[32 + i] & ~result);
350 return result;
351}
352
353/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/enc.c */
354/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
355
356#ifdef KAT
357#endif
358
359
360int crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_enc(
361 unsigned char *cstr,
362 unsigned char *k,
363 const unsigned char *pk
364)
365{
366 small r[p];
367 modq h[p];
368 modq c[p];
369 unsigned char rstr[small_encode_len];
370 unsigned char hash[64];
371
372 small_random_weightw(r);
373
374#ifdef KAT
375 {
376 int i;
377 printf("encrypt r:");
378 for (i = 0;i < p;++i)
379 if (r[i] == 1) printf(" +%d",i);
380 else if (r[i] == -1) printf(" -%d",i);
381 printf("\n");
382 }
383#endif
384
385 small_encode(rstr,r);
386 crypto_hash_sha512(hash,rstr,sizeof rstr);
387
388 rq_decode(h,pk);
389 rq_mult(c,h,r);
390 rq_round3(c,c);
391
392 memcpy(k,hash + 32,32);
393 memcpy(cstr,hash,32);
394 rq_encoderounded(cstr + 32,c);
395
396 return 0;
397}
398
399/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/keypair.c */
400/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
401
402
403#if crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_PUBLICKEYBYTES != rq_encode_len
404#error "crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_PUBLICKEYBYTES must match rq_encode_len"
405#endif
406#if crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_SECRETKEYBYTES != rq_encode_len + 2 * small_encode_len
407#error "crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_SECRETKEYBYTES must match rq_encode_len + 2 * small_encode_len"
408#endif
409
410int crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_keypair(unsigned char *pk,unsigned char *sk)
411{
412 small g[p];
413 small grecip[p];
414 small f[p];
415 modq f3recip[p];
416 modq h[p];
417
418 do
419 small_random(g);
420 while (r3_recip(grecip,g) != 0);
421
422 small_random_weightw(f);
423 rq_recip3(f3recip,f);
424
425 rq_mult(h,f3recip,g);
426
427 rq_encode(pk,h);
428 small_encode(sk,f);
429 small_encode(sk + small_encode_len,grecip);
430 memcpy(sk + 2 * small_encode_len,pk,rq_encode_len);
431
432 return 0;
433}
434
435/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/r3_mult.c */
436/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
437
438
439static void r3_mult(small *h,const small *f,const small *g)
440{
441 small fg[p + p - 1];
442 small result;
443 int i, j;
444
445 for (i = 0;i < p;++i) {
446 result = 0;
447 for (j = 0;j <= i;++j)
448 result = mod3_plusproduct(result,f[j],g[i - j]);
449 fg[i] = result;
450 }
451 for (i = p;i < p + p - 1;++i) {
452 result = 0;
453 for (j = i - p + 1;j < p;++j)
454 result = mod3_plusproduct(result,f[j],g[i - j]);
455 fg[i] = result;
456 }
457
458 for (i = p + p - 2;i >= p;--i) {
459 fg[i - p] = mod3_sum(fg[i - p],fg[i]);
460 fg[i - p + 1] = mod3_sum(fg[i - p + 1],fg[i]);
461 }
462
463 for (i = 0;i < p;++i)
464 h[i] = fg[i];
465}
466
467/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/r3_recip.c */
468/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
469
470
471/* caller must ensure that x-y does not overflow */
472static int smaller_mask_r3_recip(int x,int y)
473{
474 return (x - y) >> 31;
475}
476
477static void vectormod3_product(small *z,int len,const small *x,const small c)
478{
479 int i;
480 for (i = 0;i < len;++i) z[i] = mod3_product(x[i],c);
481}
482
483static void vectormod3_minusproduct(small *z,int len,const small *x,const small *y,const small c)
484{
485 int i;
486 for (i = 0;i < len;++i) z[i] = mod3_minusproduct(x[i],y[i],c);
487}
488
489static void vectormod3_shift(small *z,int len)
490{
491 int i;
492 for (i = len - 1;i > 0;--i) z[i] = z[i - 1];
493 z[0] = 0;
494}
495
496/*
497r = s^(-1) mod m, returning 0, if s is invertible mod m
498or returning -1 if s is not invertible mod m
499r,s are polys of degree <p
500m is x^p-x-1
501*/
502int r3_recip(small *r,const small *s)
503{
504 const int loops = 2*p + 1;
505 int loop;
506 small f[p + 1];
507 small g[p + 1];
508 small u[loops + 1];
509 small v[loops + 1];
510 small c;
511 int i;
512 int d = p;
513 int e = p;
514 int swapmask;
515
516 for (i = 2;i < p;++i) f[i] = 0;
517 f[0] = -1;
518 f[1] = -1;
519 f[p] = 1;
520 /* generalization: can initialize f to any polynomial m */
521 /* requirements: m has degree exactly p, nonzero constant coefficient */
522
523 for (i = 0;i < p;++i) g[i] = s[i];
524 g[p] = 0;
525
526 for (i = 0;i <= loops;++i) u[i] = 0;
527
528 v[0] = 1;
529 for (i = 1;i <= loops;++i) v[i] = 0;
530
531 loop = 0;
532 for (;;) {
533 /* e == -1 or d + e + loop <= 2*p */
534
535 /* f has degree p: i.e., f[p]!=0 */
536 /* f[i]==0 for i < p-d */
537
538 /* g has degree <=p (so it fits in p+1 coefficients) */
539 /* g[i]==0 for i < p-e */
540
541 /* u has degree <=loop (so it fits in loop+1 coefficients) */
542 /* u[i]==0 for i < p-d */
543 /* if invertible: u[i]==0 for i < loop-p (so can look at just p+1 coefficients) */
544
545 /* v has degree <=loop (so it fits in loop+1 coefficients) */
546 /* v[i]==0 for i < p-e */
547 /* v[i]==0 for i < loop-p (so can look at just p+1 coefficients) */
548
549 if (loop >= loops) break;
550
551 c = mod3_quotient(g[p],f[p]);
552
553 vectormod3_minusproduct(g,p + 1,g,f,c);
554 vectormod3_shift(g,p + 1);
555
556#ifdef SIMPLER
557 vectormod3_minusproduct(v,loops + 1,v,u,c);
558 vectormod3_shift(v,loops + 1);
559#else
560 if (loop < p) {
561 vectormod3_minusproduct(v,loop + 1,v,u,c);
562 vectormod3_shift(v,loop + 2);
563 } else {
564 vectormod3_minusproduct(v + loop - p,p + 1,v + loop - p,u + loop - p,c);
565 vectormod3_shift(v + loop - p,p + 2);
566 }
567#endif
568
569 e -= 1;
570
571 ++loop;
572
573 swapmask = smaller_mask_r3_recip(e,d) & mod3_nonzero_mask(g[p]);
574 swap(&e,&d,sizeof e,swapmask);
575 swap(f,g,(p + 1) * sizeof(small),swapmask);
576
577#ifdef SIMPLER
578 swap(u,v,(loops + 1) * sizeof(small),swapmask);
579#else
580 if (loop < p) {
581 swap(u,v,(loop + 1) * sizeof(small),swapmask);
582 } else {
583 swap(u + loop - p,v + loop - p,(p + 1) * sizeof(small),swapmask);
584 }
585#endif
586 }
587
588 c = mod3_reciprocal(f[p]);
589 vectormod3_product(r,p,u + p,c);
590 return smaller_mask_r3_recip(0,d);
591}
592
593/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/randomsmall.c */
594/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
595
596
597static void small_random(small *g)
598{
599 int i;
600
601 for (i = 0;i < p;++i) {
602 crypto_uint32 r = small_random32();
603 g[i] = (small) (((1073741823 & r) * 3) >> 30) - 1;
604 }
605}
606
607/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/randomweightw.c */
608/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
609
610
611static void small_random_weightw(small *f)
612{
613 crypto_int32 r[p];
614 int i;
615
616 for (i = 0;i < p;++i) r[i] = small_random32();
617 for (i = 0;i < w;++i) r[i] &= -2;
618 for (i = w;i < p;++i) r[i] = (r[i] & -3) | 1;
619 int32_sort(r,p);
620 for (i = 0;i < p;++i) f[i] = ((small) (r[i] & 3)) - 1;
621}
622
623/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/rq.c */
624/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
625
626
627static void rq_encode(unsigned char *c,const modq *f)
628{
629 crypto_int32 f0, f1, f2, f3, f4;
630 int i;
631
632 for (i = 0;i < p/5;++i) {
633 f0 = *f++ + qshift;
634 f1 = *f++ + qshift;
635 f2 = *f++ + qshift;
636 f3 = *f++ + qshift;
637 f4 = *f++ + qshift;
638 /* now want f0 + 6144*f1 + ... as a 64-bit integer */
639 f1 *= 3;
640 f2 *= 9;
641 f3 *= 27;
642 f4 *= 81;
643 /* now want f0 + f1<<11 + f2<<22 + f3<<33 + f4<<44 */
644 f0 += f1 << 11;
645 *c++ = f0; f0 >>= 8;
646 *c++ = f0; f0 >>= 8;
647 f0 += f2 << 6;
648 *c++ = f0; f0 >>= 8;
649 *c++ = f0; f0 >>= 8;
650 f0 += f3 << 1;
651 *c++ = f0; f0 >>= 8;
652 f0 += f4 << 4;
653 *c++ = f0; f0 >>= 8;
654 *c++ = f0; f0 >>= 8;
655 *c++ = f0;
656 }
657 /* XXX: using p mod 5 = 1 */
658 f0 = *f++ + qshift;
659 *c++ = f0; f0 >>= 8;
660 *c++ = f0;
661}
662
663static void rq_decode(modq *f,const unsigned char *c)
664{
665 crypto_uint32 c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7;
666 crypto_uint32 f0, f1, f2, f3, f4;
667 int i;
668
669 for (i = 0;i < p/5;++i) {
670 c0 = *c++;
671 c1 = *c++;
672 c2 = *c++;
673 c3 = *c++;
674 c4 = *c++;
675 c5 = *c++;
676 c6 = *c++;
677 c7 = *c++;
678
679 /* f0 + f1*6144 + f2*6144^2 + f3*6144^3 + f4*6144^4 */
680 /* = c0 + c1*256 + ... + c6*256^6 + c7*256^7 */
681 /* with each f between 0 and 4590 */
682
683 c6 += c7 << 8;
684 /* c6 <= 23241 = floor(4591*6144^4/2^48) */
685 /* f4 = (16/81)c6 + (1/1296)(c5+[0,1]) - [0,0.75] */
686 /* claim: 2^19 f4 < x < 2^19(f4+1) */
687 /* where x = 103564 c6 + 405(c5+1) */
688 /* proof: x - 2^19 f4 = (76/81)c6 + (37/81)c5 + 405 - (32768/81)[0,1] + 2^19[0,0.75] */
689 /* at least 405 - 32768/81 > 0 */
690 /* at most (76/81)23241 + (37/81)255 + 405 + 2^19 0.75 < 2^19 */
691 f4 = (103564*c6 + 405*(c5+1)) >> 19;
692
693 c5 += c6 << 8;
694 c5 -= (f4 * 81) << 4;
695 c4 += c5 << 8;
696
697 /* f0 + f1*6144 + f2*6144^2 + f3*6144^3 */
698 /* = c0 + c1*256 + c2*256^2 + c3*256^3 + c4*256^4 */
699 /* c4 <= 247914 = floor(4591*6144^3/2^32) */
700 /* f3 = (1/54)(c4+[0,1]) - [0,0.75] */
701 /* claim: 2^19 f3 < x < 2^19(f3+1) */
702 /* where x = 9709(c4+2) */
703 /* proof: x - 2^19 f3 = 19418 - (1/27)c4 - (262144/27)[0,1] + 2^19[0,0.75] */
704 /* at least 19418 - 247914/27 - 262144/27 > 0 */
705 /* at most 19418 + 2^19 0.75 < 2^19 */
706 f3 = (9709*(c4+2)) >> 19;
707
708 c4 -= (f3 * 27) << 1;
709 c3 += c4 << 8;
710 /* f0 + f1*6144 + f2*6144^2 */
711 /* = c0 + c1*256 + c2*256^2 + c3*256^3 */
712 /* c3 <= 10329 = floor(4591*6144^2/2^24) */
713 /* f2 = (4/9)c3 + (1/576)c2 + (1/147456)c1 + (1/37748736)c0 - [0,0.75] */
714 /* claim: 2^19 f2 < x < 2^19(f2+1) */
715 /* where x = 233017 c3 + 910(c2+2) */
716 /* proof: x - 2^19 f2 = 1820 + (1/9)c3 - (2/9)c2 - (32/9)c1 - (1/72)c0 + 2^19[0,0.75] */
717 /* at least 1820 - (2/9)255 - (32/9)255 - (1/72)255 > 0 */
718 /* at most 1820 + (1/9)10329 + 2^19 0.75 < 2^19 */
719 f2 = (233017*c3 + 910*(c2+2)) >> 19;
720
721 c2 += c3 << 8;
722 c2 -= (f2 * 9) << 6;
723 c1 += c2 << 8;
724 /* f0 + f1*6144 */
725 /* = c0 + c1*256 */
726 /* c1 <= 110184 = floor(4591*6144/2^8) */
727 /* f1 = (1/24)c1 + (1/6144)c0 - (1/6144)f0 */
728 /* claim: 2^19 f1 < x < 2^19(f1+1) */
729 /* where x = 21845(c1+2) + 85 c0 */
730 /* proof: x - 2^19 f1 = 43690 - (1/3)c1 - (1/3)c0 + 2^19 [0,0.75] */
731 /* at least 43690 - (1/3)110184 - (1/3)255 > 0 */
732 /* at most 43690 + 2^19 0.75 < 2^19 */
733 f1 = (21845*(c1+2) + 85*c0) >> 19;
734
735 c1 -= (f1 * 3) << 3;
736 c0 += c1 << 8;
737 f0 = c0;
738
739 *f++ = modq_freeze(f0 + q - qshift);
740 *f++ = modq_freeze(f1 + q - qshift);
741 *f++ = modq_freeze(f2 + q - qshift);
742 *f++ = modq_freeze(f3 + q - qshift);
743 *f++ = modq_freeze(f4 + q - qshift);
744 }
745
746 c0 = *c++;
747 c1 = *c++;
748 c0 += c1 << 8;
749 *f++ = modq_freeze(c0 + q - qshift);
750}
751
752/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/rq_mult.c */
753/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
754
755
756static void rq_mult(modq *h,const modq *f,const small *g)
757{
758 modq fg[p + p - 1];
759 modq result;
760 int i, j;
761
762 for (i = 0;i < p;++i) {
763 result = 0;
764 for (j = 0;j <= i;++j)
765 result = modq_plusproduct(result,f[j],g[i - j]);
766 fg[i] = result;
767 }
768 for (i = p;i < p + p - 1;++i) {
769 result = 0;
770 for (j = i - p + 1;j < p;++j)
771 result = modq_plusproduct(result,f[j],g[i - j]);
772 fg[i] = result;
773 }
774
775 for (i = p + p - 2;i >= p;--i) {
776 fg[i - p] = modq_sum(fg[i - p],fg[i]);
777 fg[i - p + 1] = modq_sum(fg[i - p + 1],fg[i]);
778 }
779
780 for (i = 0;i < p;++i)
781 h[i] = fg[i];
782}
783
784/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/rq_recip3.c */
785/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
786
787
788/* caller must ensure that x-y does not overflow */
789static int smaller_mask_rq_recip3(int x,int y)
790{
791 return (x - y) >> 31;
792}
793
794static void vectormodq_product(modq *z,int len,const modq *x,const modq c)
795{
796 int i;
797 for (i = 0;i < len;++i) z[i] = modq_product(x[i],c);
798}
799
800static void vectormodq_minusproduct(modq *z,int len,const modq *x,const modq *y,const modq c)
801{
802 int i;
803 for (i = 0;i < len;++i) z[i] = modq_minusproduct(x[i],y[i],c);
804}
805
806static void vectormodq_shift(modq *z,int len)
807{
808 int i;
809 for (i = len - 1;i > 0;--i) z[i] = z[i - 1];
810 z[0] = 0;
811}
812
813/*
814r = (3s)^(-1) mod m, returning 0, if s is invertible mod m
815or returning -1 if s is not invertible mod m
816r,s are polys of degree <p
817m is x^p-x-1
818*/
819int rq_recip3(modq *r,const small *s)
820{
821 const int loops = 2*p + 1;
822 int loop;
823 modq f[p + 1];
824 modq g[p + 1];
825 modq u[loops + 1];
826 modq v[loops + 1];
827 modq c;
828 int i;
829 int d = p;
830 int e = p;
831 int swapmask;
832
833 for (i = 2;i < p;++i) f[i] = 0;
834 f[0] = -1;
835 f[1] = -1;
836 f[p] = 1;
837 /* generalization: can initialize f to any polynomial m */
838 /* requirements: m has degree exactly p, nonzero constant coefficient */
839
840 for (i = 0;i < p;++i) g[i] = 3 * s[i];
841 g[p] = 0;
842
843 for (i = 0;i <= loops;++i) u[i] = 0;
844
845 v[0] = 1;
846 for (i = 1;i <= loops;++i) v[i] = 0;
847
848 loop = 0;
849 for (;;) {
850 /* e == -1 or d + e + loop <= 2*p */
851
852 /* f has degree p: i.e., f[p]!=0 */
853 /* f[i]==0 for i < p-d */
854
855 /* g has degree <=p (so it fits in p+1 coefficients) */
856 /* g[i]==0 for i < p-e */
857
858 /* u has degree <=loop (so it fits in loop+1 coefficients) */
859 /* u[i]==0 for i < p-d */
860 /* if invertible: u[i]==0 for i < loop-p (so can look at just p+1 coefficients) */
861
862 /* v has degree <=loop (so it fits in loop+1 coefficients) */
863 /* v[i]==0 for i < p-e */
864 /* v[i]==0 for i < loop-p (so can look at just p+1 coefficients) */
865
866 if (loop >= loops) break;
867
868 c = modq_quotient(g[p],f[p]);
869
870 vectormodq_minusproduct(g,p + 1,g,f,c);
871 vectormodq_shift(g,p + 1);
872
873#ifdef SIMPLER
874 vectormodq_minusproduct(v,loops + 1,v,u,c);
875 vectormodq_shift(v,loops + 1);
876#else
877 if (loop < p) {
878 vectormodq_minusproduct(v,loop + 1,v,u,c);
879 vectormodq_shift(v,loop + 2);
880 } else {
881 vectormodq_minusproduct(v + loop - p,p + 1,v + loop - p,u + loop - p,c);
882 vectormodq_shift(v + loop - p,p + 2);
883 }
884#endif
885
886 e -= 1;
887
888 ++loop;
889
890 swapmask = smaller_mask_rq_recip3(e,d) & modq_nonzero_mask(g[p]);
891 swap(&e,&d,sizeof e,swapmask);
892 swap(f,g,(p + 1) * sizeof(modq),swapmask);
893
894#ifdef SIMPLER
895 swap(u,v,(loops + 1) * sizeof(modq),swapmask);
896#else
897 if (loop < p) {
898 swap(u,v,(loop + 1) * sizeof(modq),swapmask);
899 } else {
900 swap(u + loop - p,v + loop - p,(p + 1) * sizeof(modq),swapmask);
901 }
902#endif
903 }
904
905 c = modq_reciprocal(f[p]);
906 vectormodq_product(r,p,u + p,c);
907 return smaller_mask_rq_recip3(0,d);
908}
909
910/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/rq_round3.c */
911/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
912
913
914static void rq_round3(modq *h,const modq *f)
915{
916 int i;
917
918 for (i = 0;i < p;++i)
919 h[i] = ((21846 * (f[i] + 2295) + 32768) >> 16) * 3 - 2295;
920}
921
922/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/rq_rounded.c */
923/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
924
925
926static void rq_encoderounded(unsigned char *c,const modq *f)
927{
928 crypto_int32 f0, f1, f2;
929 int i;
930
931 for (i = 0;i < p/3;++i) {
932 f0 = *f++ + qshift;
933 f1 = *f++ + qshift;
934 f2 = *f++ + qshift;
935 f0 = (21846 * f0) >> 16;
936 f1 = (21846 * f1) >> 16;
937 f2 = (21846 * f2) >> 16;
938 /* now want f0 + f1*1536 + f2*1536^2 as a 32-bit integer */
939 f2 *= 3;
940 f1 += f2 << 9;
941 f1 *= 3;
942 f0 += f1 << 9;
943 *c++ = f0; f0 >>= 8;
944 *c++ = f0; f0 >>= 8;
945 *c++ = f0; f0 >>= 8;
946 *c++ = f0;
947 }
948 /* XXX: using p mod 3 = 2 */
949 f0 = *f++ + qshift;
950 f1 = *f++ + qshift;
951 f0 = (21846 * f0) >> 16;
952 f1 = (21846 * f1) >> 16;
953 f1 *= 3;
954 f0 += f1 << 9;
955 *c++ = f0; f0 >>= 8;
956 *c++ = f0; f0 >>= 8;
957 *c++ = f0;
958}
959
960static void rq_decoderounded(modq *f,const unsigned char *c)
961{
962 crypto_uint32 c0, c1, c2, c3;
963 crypto_uint32 f0, f1, f2;
964 int i;
965
966 for (i = 0;i < p/3;++i) {
967 c0 = *c++;
968 c1 = *c++;
969 c2 = *c++;
970 c3 = *c++;
971
972 /* f0 + f1*1536 + f2*1536^2 */
973 /* = c0 + c1*256 + c2*256^2 + c3*256^3 */
974 /* with each f between 0 and 1530 */
975
976 /* f2 = (64/9)c3 + (1/36)c2 + (1/9216)c1 + (1/2359296)c0 - [0,0.99675] */
977 /* claim: 2^21 f2 < x < 2^21(f2+1) */
978 /* where x = 14913081*c3 + 58254*c2 + 228*(c1+2) */
979 /* proof: x - 2^21 f2 = 456 - (8/9)c0 + (4/9)c1 - (2/9)c2 + (1/9)c3 + 2^21 [0,0.99675] */
980 /* at least 456 - (8/9)255 - (2/9)255 > 0 */
981 /* at most 456 + (4/9)255 + (1/9)255 + 2^21 0.99675 < 2^21 */
982 f2 = (14913081*c3 + 58254*c2 + 228*(c1+2)) >> 21;
983
984 c2 += c3 << 8;
985 c2 -= (f2 * 9) << 2;
986 /* f0 + f1*1536 */
987 /* = c0 + c1*256 + c2*256^2 */
988 /* c2 <= 35 = floor((1530+1530*1536)/256^2) */
989 /* f1 = (128/3)c2 + (1/6)c1 + (1/1536)c0 - (1/1536)f0 */
990 /* claim: 2^21 f1 < x < 2^21(f1+1) */
991 /* where x = 89478485*c2 + 349525*c1 + 1365*(c0+1) */
992 /* proof: x - 2^21 f1 = 1365 - (1/3)c2 - (1/3)c1 - (1/3)c0 + (4096/3)f0 */
993 /* at least 1365 - (1/3)35 - (1/3)255 - (1/3)255 > 0 */
994 /* at most 1365 + (4096/3)1530 < 2^21 */
995 f1 = (89478485*c2 + 349525*c1 + 1365*(c0+1)) >> 21;
996
997 c1 += c2 << 8;
998 c1 -= (f1 * 3) << 1;
999
1000 c0 += c1 << 8;
1001 f0 = c0;
1002
1003 *f++ = modq_freeze(f0 * 3 + q - qshift);
1004 *f++ = modq_freeze(f1 * 3 + q - qshift);
1005 *f++ = modq_freeze(f2 * 3 + q - qshift);
1006 }
1007
1008 c0 = *c++;
1009 c1 = *c++;
1010 c2 = *c++;
1011
1012 f1 = (89478485*c2 + 349525*c1 + 1365*(c0+1)) >> 21;
1013
1014 c1 += c2 << 8;
1015 c1 -= (f1 * 3) << 1;
1016
1017 c0 += c1 << 8;
1018 f0 = c0;
1019
1020 *f++ = modq_freeze(f0 * 3 + q - qshift);
1021 *f++ = modq_freeze(f1 * 3 + q - qshift);
1022}
1023
1024/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/small.c */
1025/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
1026
1027
1028/* XXX: these functions rely on p mod 4 = 1 */
1029
1030/* all coefficients in -1, 0, 1 */
1031static void small_encode(unsigned char *c,const small *f)
1032{
1033 small c0;
1034 int i;
1035
1036 for (i = 0;i < p/4;++i) {
1037 c0 = *f++ + 1;
1038 c0 += (*f++ + 1) << 2;
1039 c0 += (*f++ + 1) << 4;
1040 c0 += (*f++ + 1) << 6;
1041 *c++ = c0;
1042 }
1043 c0 = *f++ + 1;
1044 *c++ = c0;
1045}
1046
1047static void small_decode(small *f,const unsigned char *c)
1048{
1049 unsigned char c0;
1050 int i;
1051
1052 for (i = 0;i < p/4;++i) {
1053 c0 = *c++;
1054 *f++ = ((small) (c0 & 3)) - 1; c0 >>= 2;
1055 *f++ = ((small) (c0 & 3)) - 1; c0 >>= 2;
1056 *f++ = ((small) (c0 & 3)) - 1; c0 >>= 2;
1057 *f++ = ((small) (c0 & 3)) - 1;
1058 }
1059 c0 = *c++;
1060 *f++ = ((small) (c0 & 3)) - 1;
1061}
1062
1063/* from libpqcrypto-20180314/crypto_kem/sntrup4591761/ref/swap.c */
1064/* See https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html for detailed documentation. */
1065
1066
1067static void swap(void *x,void *y,int bytes,int mask)
1068{
1069 int i;
1070 char xi, yi, c, t;
1071
1072 c = mask;
1073
1074 for (i = 0;i < bytes;++i) {
1075 xi = i[(char *) x];
1076 yi = i[(char *) y];
1077 t = c & (xi ^ yi);
1078 xi ^= t;
1079 yi ^= t;
1080 i[(char *) x] = xi;
1081 i[(char *) y] = yi;
1082 }
1083}
